name: Hawken Forum Tweaks
description: A brief set of tweaks to the Hawken Forums to fix the various style bugs on the website. Check the notes for a list of fixes.
additional_info:
Fixes included:
* Fix the color of ignored posts.
* Fix the background color of the unloaded 'fast reply' form on threads.
* Fix the text color on unfollow item confirmation prompts.

Changelog:

Version 1.0.0
* Initial release
* Fixes the color of ignored posts
* Fixes the initial background color of the 'fast reply' form on threads to something closer to the color of the loaded thread
* Fixes the text color on unfollow confirmation prompts.
